Name: acute pericementitis
Definition: A lymphoblastic leukemia characterized by over production of B-cells and their accumulation in bone marrow and blood.

Name: aggressive periodontitis
Definition: A periodontitis that is characterized by rapid attachment loss and bone destruction in the presence of little local factors such as dental plaque and dental calculus resulting in inflammation and a loss of periodontium.

Name: periapical periodontitis
Definition: A breast duct papilloma that is characterized by the presence of cells that are abnormal but are not yet malignant.
